document.discussion_title: Re: Corrections to a misleading article
document.topic_text: Quote Hello, can anyone please help? I would like to talk about an article posted on this site, with the hope that some points discussed within it can then be quickly and simply corrected. Can anyone please provide me with an email contact address, for realitywives, with which to discus the matter further and in more detail? Thank you in hope. Logged
